AutomaticBackupDescription: Set up scheduled backups for continuous data protection without manual actions.
BackupRoomDescription: Save a backup to a selected room or the {{sectionName}} section. Use existing rooms or create a new one.
ConnectService: Connect the service <1>here</1> to enable backup features
ContactToPayer: Contact the Payer (<1>{{email}}</1>) to connect the backup service.
DisableBackupConfirm: Disabling the Backup service will prevent {{productName}} administrators from creating backups. If Auto Backup is enabled, it will remain active within the free quota, but once the quota is fully utilized, it will be permanently deactivated. Are you sure you want to continue?
DisableBackupConfirmWithoutQuota: Disabling the Backup service will prevent {{productName}} administrators from creating backups. If Auto Backup is enabled, it will be deactivated. Are you sure you want to continue?
EnableBackupConfirm: Enabling the Backup service will allow all {{productName}} administrators to create backups anytime, as long as the wallet balance is sufficient. Are you sure you want to continue?
TemporaryDescription: Create a backup stored in the "Backup" section. Available for download within 24 hours after creation.
ThirdPartyResourceDescription: Connect and save backups to cloud accounts like Dropbox, Box, OneDrive, or Google Drive.
ThirdPartyStorageDescription: Use third-party services to store your backups. Ideal for connecting external cloud storage platforms.
